full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I SGRUB THABS 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI'I SNYING KHU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,'PHAGS MA YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I GDOD GSOL LS BZHI LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES RJE BTZUN BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I BSGRUB THABS 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI'I NYING KHU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL NGOR BTZUN GZUGS DAM TSIG RDO RJE GRAGS KYIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
